5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Abbas said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) stayed for nineteen days in which he shortened his prayer to two Rak’ah. So, whenever we stayed for nineteen days we would shorten our prayer to two Rak’ah, but if we stayed more than that we would pray four Rak’ah.”

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ يَقْصُرُ الصَّلاَةَ الْمُسَافِرُ إِذَا أَقَامَ بِبَلْدَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: For how long may a traveler shorten his Prayer if he stays in a town?
